entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
